FirstPage.YourWeather: Your weather, always at hand! Don't let the weather surprise you. Let's go!

Sunny.1: Put on your sunglasses, you shine brighter than Edward Cullen in the sun!
Sunny.2: It's so nice out, we could film an episode of *Friends* on the beach.
Sunny.3: The sun is out, even Superman is taking advantage to recharge his batteries.

Cloudy.1: What?! The sun is hidden! Is it the mothership from *Independence Day*?
Cloudy.2: It's so cloudy that even Gandalf isn't as grey.
Cloudy.3: Grey sky? It looks like the beginning of a Tim Burton movie.

Rainy.1: It's raining, it's pouring, don't forget your magical umbrella like Mary Poppins!
Rainy.2: Think of your rubber boots, you're ready for a *Jurassic Park* adventure.
Rainy.3: I'M SINGING IN THE RAIN JUST SINGING IN THE RAIN

Stormy.1: Watch out, Thor is out with his hammer today!
Stormy.2: Watch out, Zeus is doing clay pigeon shooting today!
Stormy.3: The storm is coming, it's not recommended to fly a kite.

Snowy.1: The snow is falling like someone opened the wardrobe door to Narnia.
Snowy.2: It's time to build a snowman, Olaf will be jealous!
Snowy.3: Snow! Elsa is singing 'Let It Go' again.

Windy.1: It's blowing hard, like when you stood in front of the fan as a kid.
Windy.2: There's too much wind today, no need to style your hair.
Windy.3: Strong winds today, it's not recommended to play Quidditch.

Foggy.1: It's so foggy we could film an episode of *Sherlock*.
Foggy.2: Thick fog? Perfect for a *Scooby-Doo* mystery.

Heatwave.2: Extreme heat: it's not even this hot on Arrakis in *Dune*.
Heatwave.3: The sun is playing the barbecue card to the max, stay in the shade to avoid ending up like Anakin on Mustafar.

Frost.1: It's cold, Elsa is singing 'Let It Go' again.
Frost.2: Freezing weather: perfect for a cozy day in!
Frost.3: With this cold, it's like you're in The Day After Tomorrow.

Localisation.SelectedCityDefault: The selected city will be displayed by default when you open your space.
